Review.Contenu: THE WORST TOOL EVER!I HAVE HAD 10% BOUNCE RATE WITH THESE MFfucckers! I'm so angry, my cold email system is fuccked because of them

I had a really bad experience trying to create an account with this service. They prevented my registration and wouldn't tell me why. When I asked if it was due to my sexual orientation, they just avoided the question. They didn't even answer "No, not because of that". It is unacceptable to encounter discrimination of any form and I cannot recommend using this service as it appears to have questionable practices. People should be careful where they spend their money. It's a shame I can't attach screenshots of this conversation...Avoid!

I used the service of Zero Bounce. After paying more than 150$ to clean my clients data base, I sent an email campaign to the active emails.Many of them had a hard bounce, making my campaign totally disastrous. All the emails ended up in the spam folders and my domain is now considered spam.I contacted Zero Bounce to ask why did their service told me that those emails were good when they weren't and they answered that they knew about it, but that is not so important. Now they blocked my account and I cannot even use the remaining credits I had. I feel scammed and very disappointed.

Review.Titre: CALLED MY CELL PHONE WITHOUT MY LEGAL…
Review.Contenu: CALLED MY CELL PHONE WITHOUT MY LEGAL CONSENT!  LEAVE ME ALONE MY F**KING ACCOUNT WAS DELETED!
Doesnt work. Always freeze. Not good

After running my email list through Zero Bounce and getting rid of all that were found to be bad emails, I sent an email to the cleaned up list only to be reprimanded by the email blaster webmaster (sendpulse.com) for having a too high bounce rate of 8%. Zero Bounce still have work to do on their system or did I do anything wrong along the way of cleaning up my list?

Your password requirement is the stupidest system I've ever  used. Each time I try to use the password, it says it is invalid.If you are sending the results and the password to the same email address, why is it secure or at all necessary.It is so tedious to get the results , unless you change this I will not renew.

After going paying money and using their process, my list of their confirmed only emails were still rejected by MailChimp and there was no way to determine why. Only that some emails in the list had problems. How do you find which one? Waste of time and money.

Review.Titre: Question asked on how to use the …
Review.Contenu: Question asked on how to use the software/service.No answer pertaining to the question replied.Giving a one-star rating is too generous already.If there a negative five-star rating, they should deserve it.
Very misleading pageVery misleading page. They claim to offer a lot of features they don't even have, also very slow and inaccurate service. I honestly don't recommend them.

Review.Titre: I don't like the UI and didn't …
Review.Contenu: I don't like the UI and didn't understand at very first sight.Signed up and instantly got 3 emails.Should I be receiving such emails just for a signup.

Review.Titre: even after using ur service we still…
Review.Contenu: even after using ur service we still have bounce e-mails so no i wonder how clean my database it.already one website blocked me from using their services
Over half of the emails come back as 'catch-all', which simply means they don't know if it's good or not. Waste of time and money

Review.Titre: Why would I use you guys if you have a…
Review.Contenu: Why would I use you guys if you have a ton of catch all email addresses you can't verify? #Useless

Review.Titre: Took too long to clean my list
Review.Contenu: Took too long to clean my list.  7% of my emails bounced.    Poor accuracy and user experience
Did not work for me.  Results received were inadequate and not acceptable.
email list contained numerous spam traps not identified by zerobounce
Very Bad, unacceptable experience, unreasonable and rude conduct.
Obsolete algorithms provide unacceptably inaccurate results
Didn't Accomplish anything - complete waste of money.

Review.Titre: I have serious doubts about this service

Review.Contenu: way too many emails. all seemed too pushy.
not very userfriendly - data is ok

Review.Titre: The results were very ineffective and…
Review.Contenu: The results were very ineffective and not giving a clear picture to take any action.

Wasn't impressed, had  3200 emails to verify and over 80% came back as " do not mail " ? And nobody could me a proper explanation of what that meant.  Of the 326 that were supposed to  not valid I found many of them to actually be legitimate..so for me  was a waste of $15.

Review.Titre: Invalid mail even if they're valid
Review.Contenu: The ZeroBounce system marked 9,000 mail as "invalid" because fails to check the syntax of them, while the syntax was correct. Also the support was unable to find the reason so they refound me 20,000 credit. Well.. thank you very much for the credit, but I think that a good support should resolve this kind of issue.. the service should be able to recognize a good mail.. doesn't it?

Review.Titre: I was very enthusiast about Zero Bounce …
Review.Contenu: I was very enthusiast about Zero Bounce but it gave me poor results. I will spend my credits but probably not spend another money on that site !

Review.Titre: Got into trouble finally with MC blast …
Review.Contenu: Got into trouble finally with MC blast after cleaning lists with zero bounce
Did not helpMy servers continue to be listed as spammers

Review.Titre: Got 3 mails and 3 calls in less than a…
Review.Contenu: Got 3 mails and 3 calls in less than a week from Zerobouce, that's a little too much. And I could not know if the email was valid for half of them.
I used your service .Overall results are good But not accurate 100% .But Now your current price is not worth of invested money on your site.

Zero Bounce is certainly very convenient. However I am not 100% confident about the output. Several times even after running database through Zero bounce, we receive a lot of hard and soft bounces on the database. While the platform is very secure, it should have variable degrees of strictness with which email IDs should be reviewed

I had initial issues with my first trial of ZeroBounce, but the team was very helpful and directed me to an additional service to validate catch-alls, which has proven to be a great way to find more valid emails. I do wish this "A.I." info was provided in the first review rather than requiring paying for a second run, but they are the only ones who have this service that I know of. Customer service and chat was very responsive.

Zerobounce is a good tool to validate email addresses. The only shortfall is that it doesn't provide free email validation and scrubbing. I like the free analysis part, but you should also provide a free sample to clean up to 1000 email addresses. Other than that, it's very good.

Review.Titre: Still have plenty of bad emails in the list
Review.Contenu: We used a premium service and paid a lot of money for this service. Unfortunately we still have over 5% bad emails. This amounts to over 6,000 bad emails in our database. We are now considering using another provider that can completely cleanse our database from bad emails.

Review.Titre: i wanted the list of invalid mails
Review.Contenu: i wanted the list of invalid mails, that´s why i wanted the service, neverthless the downloaded list indeed gave me the "invalid" ones but!! many of them were actually valid, i checked all of them and many were valid.

Review.Titre: Clean data, but super slow upload
Review.Contenu: The data I received help me clean my database so my bounce rates were significantly improved. My only complaint about ZeroBounce is that it took nearly an hour to upload a file of 18,000 contacts.

Review.Titre: Process is painless, but missed spam traps...
Review.Contenu: The process itself is painless, however, the list was still rejected by our email service due to spam traps missed by ZeroBounce and marked valid. We were still unable to use the list...

Review.Titre: Zero Bounce has been good for helping…
Review.Contenu: Zero Bounce has been good for helping me verify valid email addresses but not precise. There's still some unclearness to which emails I should go ahead with pursuing.
processing time - Compared to other tools out there the email processing takes time.List Export- multiple clicks after the list import makes the task tedious

Review.Titre: just not able to verify catch-all…
Review.Contenu: just not able to verify catch-all accounts - may be beyond anyone's control.there are also email addresses verified to be valid that are actually invalid.

Review.Titre: 12% bounce rate is 3 to 4 fours as high …
Review.Contenu: 12% bounce rate is 3 to 4 fours as high as I expected. Not sure, whether we will continue using the service - will see how other services do.

Review.Titre: Our company used the Zero Bounce
Review.Contenu: Our company used the Zero Bounce. Yes it is good by cleaning all unwanted mail ID, but Still some spam trap has reported by spamhus.

Review.Titre: Even on valid emails it still fails
Review.Contenu: Even on valid emails it still fails, even after you supply the email address into the database to be recognized as valid.

Review.Titre: It was good but I still got some hard…
Review.Contenu: It was good but I still got some hard bounces but it could have been way more zerobounce found over 2k bad emails
Easy to use, but got in my opinion a bit to high bounce rate on an email blast after using ZeroBounce
1/ A bit slow. 2/ The design could have been easier to understand, thus avoiding a few misunderstandings.

Review.Titre: Zerobounce, good, but needs some improvements.
Review.Contenu: To start, I'm not an IT expert I'm just a marketing coordinator who needs to use these services to improve my marketing output. I guess you can say I'm a regular consumer. So, I used Zerobounce to clean up a list. The website is simple, without bells and whistles, and more designed for IT and data professionals than general consumers like me. The service did a good job of identifying the various categories of files (valid, spamtrap, catchall, etc.). It also provides a good PDF report that summarizes the results. However, it does not provide a description or definition of these category names. They assume that their users will know what they are, which is not necessarily the case. I contacted customer service and they seemed to be as clueless insisting that the definitions were on the summary report, which they are not, only the description names are listed with no indication as to what they mean and how they can affect your list. The services does what it's supposed to do, but the customer care part of the site could use some improvements. Zerobounce is best for developers. Next time I will probably use Neverbounce, a bit more expensive, but their website is very user friendly.
Although one of the better providers there is plenty of room for improvement and service enhancement
ZeroBounce is best in the business, but pricing does not suit  for small business.
Pretty good after sales agent, simple and reactive staff. Keep growing !

Review.Titre: I'm still bouncing about 20% of my…
Review.Contenu: I'm still bouncing about 20% of my mails after doing the cleaning.
I've tried zerobounce but it doesn't fit entirely to my need

Review.Titre: Yahoo email list is hard to validate
Review.Contenu: email addresses with yahoo domains are not validated accurately.

Review.Titre: I felt that the customer service was…
Review.Contenu: I felt that the customer service was not too helpful at all.
Pretty slow, compared to others that I was testing with.

Review.Titre: i can see that validated emails are…
Review.Contenu: i can see that validated emails are getting bounced.
I did not like the user experience, i.e. the UI.
We still have bouncebacks on the valid emails.

Review.Titre: should show example before you make an …
Review.Contenu: should show example before you make an account
User friendly, but too many “catch alls!
7% bounce rate. An unpleasant surprise.
Average experience.

Review.Titre: Very good service and does exactly what…
Review.Contenu: Very good service and does exactly what it says but I think the cost is too high. I recently used a competitor and saved about 50% for the same volume. ZeroBounce may well have slightly more accuracy but in my case the difference in that regard was negligible and not worth the extra expense

Review.Titre: We have a somewhat outdated database of…
Review.Contenu: We have a somewhat outdated database of 20k contacts. ZeroBounce was our choice to do a one-time list cleanse. ZeroBounce was very helpful in culling duplicates and helped us feret out thousands of no longer working and otherwise inappropriate emails. We will use them once a year or so. If you have a vibrant list, it may be worth it to use them monthly.

Fairly reliable Email verification service. API runs smoothly. Make sure you wait about 90 minutes after purchasing new credits. Otherwise, the API will return an insufficient funds error. Some addresses ZB marks as usable may be excluded by outreach platforms like BuzzSumo or Ninja Outreach. They likely use different validation techniques, scoring or another 3rd party provider entirely.

Simple to use, Price is very reasonable for what we use it for in an industry that has a lot of change. Maybe include a % success rate in the catch all emails like info/accounting etc. or include that in the valid emails if the success rate is high so we can count those as valid emails if 85% or higher.

Review.Titre: Great service for verifying long email lists…
Review.Contenu: Great service for verifying long email lists.  This has worked well in my experience.  The only reason I didn't give 5 starts is for the fact you have to run two different verifications, one with your main list and another for your "Catch Alls".  If this was more automated, it would be great
Not all of the ‘verified’ addresses ended up being deliverable. I sent only a few days after the process completed. I’m not sure I’d bother in future given the cost.

Review.Titre: I have been using ZeroBounce to help clean marketing lists before sending emails.
Review.Contenu: I have been using ZeroBounce to help clean marketing lists. It's been a huge help in finding and reporting invalid email addresses BEFORE we send emails out. It works great!

Despite some initial misunderstanding, it was a good conversation. The friendly, human touch and approach won through. The result was a very thorough answer to my questions, some good advice and a satisfied customer. Thank you.

Very simple to use. Doesn't get my bounces quite down to zero, but still a helpful tool. I wish I got a status report of how many were "removed" each month to let me know the quality of the emails I'm scrubbing.

Review.Titre: The email service tool is quick and…
Review.Contenu: The email service tool is quick and easy to use. It doesn't go into great detail on some of the email checks, but for an easy overview the tool works great to fine bad emails.

Review.Titre: Support staff are pretty good with…
Review.Contenu: Support staff are pretty good with following up on issues
Good product, great customer service and fairly intuitive.  I'd be willing to use the product again

Review.Titre: Easy to use, clean and crisp execution of data scrub
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce is an easy to use, effective platform for scrubbing your data prior to utilizing for marketing purposes.   From validation of email address, to additional information and compliance adherence, this is a great program to consider for both new list information and existing data cleansing.
Great customer support, was immediately assisted once needed, and given help very clearly and concisely.

Review.Titre: Easy to use with informative support…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use with informative support info.
Works as expected.  Cost seems fair.

Review.Titre: Before scanning my list with ZeroBounce …
Review.Contenu: Before scanning my list with ZeroBounce I sent to roughly 10k addresses and tons of them bounced. I then ran **the same 10k addresses** with ZeroBounce. ZeroBounce's results were very similar to the actual bounces I received on my real send. In other words: the ZeroBounce service was very accurate. I used ZeroBounce on roughly 280k more addresses and my bounce rate dropped from 29% to 0.4%. I'm a happy customer.

After using your competitor, kickbox.io - your prices are definitely competitive there (a few hundred difference in 1000's list cleaning). I don't like how you say the data will only be held for 30 days - I'm doing a 90 day campaign and don't want to download them right away. From strictly UX perspective, you may not be where kickbox.io is but enough to get a data nerd through the workflow.I would recommend to others based on my experience.

I used ZeroBounce to clean/validate a list of about 40k emails. A/B testing with the clean vs not, it seemed to have some improvement, if not huge. Reviewing the list of "invalid" emails, it did seem accurate, so perhaps I would have seen a bigger impact with a "worse" list. While it didn't make a big difference on my email performance, I would still try ZeroBounce again if I needed to go through this process in the future.

Zero Bounce help me to maintain clean my database. Before, I worked hard manually in order to eliminate bad contacts but now it's a task 100% automatized. It allow me to save time, and focus on important things. I highly recommend this tool for business with manage a contacts database. Moreover, the mailing stats will be better.

Review.Titre: Solid service to help clean up client distribution lists
Review.Contenu: We've been using ZeroBounce for a couple of months now, and the validation tools have proved very useful to us.  The set of files, including the summary, that are produced are extensive and helpful.It all works well, and my only concern concern is that none of it looks very good.  The UI of the website and the design of the summary PDF, in particular, could really benefit from some additional attention to design.  We can live with it, but improvement here would be very welcome.

The online tool did not pick up in any of the spamtrap emails that our email marketing provider advised had made it into our list. However the company provided extremely good service to identify and remove those emails themselves. Outstanding level of customer service but lost a little confidence in their online tool.

I had in general good experience. You have better pricing than some of the other players I have used, but I got some bounced email after using your service. Not substantial but from other vendor I used in past, I got 0 bounce - but it was much costlier. Overall I am satisfied and will use your service again in future.

The service works well and results are reliable and clear.The problem is that sometimes it take several second to validate an email (only with not common email services, gmail, yahoo, ecc works fast). Is not a big deal if you has to validate bulk emails, but an issue if you want a real-time validation through API.

Review.Titre: I used ZeroBounce to validate all the…
Review.Contenu: I used ZeroBounce to validate all the emails in our system. I had a couple of small issues getting started and the support team was outstanding in terms of speed of response and resolution. I did some spot checking and ran into just a handful of false negatives (due to customer email server configuration).

Ideally, we need an email validation service that can determine whether an email is valid or invalid and therefore not classify the rest in the middle as unknown. This is what everyone needs to have as a service. I appreciate that firewalls make this difficult, but what is the solution as we need it?

After more than $500 doing validations for my customers, I can tell you the reports and data received is almost perfect.If you use their web site to do a validation you receive a spreadsheet with all the results (in fact like 7 different files) each one specifying the result (toxic, good, catch-all, etc) and the extra data (known first/last name for emails) is a great addition.Deduplication is free which is great.The only reason I don't give 5 stars is that catch-all emails sometimes contain also 550 results (email not found) something I don't think is correct.

Review.Titre: I have tried multiple list cleaning…
Review.Contenu: I have tried multiple list cleaning services, finally satisfied with ZeroBounce results. Other services just removing hard-bounces, here ZeroBounce removes Spam complainers, spam traps etc. Why 4 stars means ZeroBounce is unable to add First_Name, Second_Name to some emails.

Review.Titre: I just recently have purchased this
Review.Contenu: I just recently have purchased this. I do like how everything is given back in separate files and also its wayyy cheaper than briteverify. I wish they can have the "catch all" emails also carefully verified as well. Overall, i would definitely recommend to others.

Really like ZeroBounce. Price is competitive, and it's the only email validator that provides results in protected zip folders. I like it's ease of use and what seems to be an easy API integration. We used ZeroBounce to clean a client's contact list, and still came back with 6% bounced.I tried a different list cleaning service and their email bounces are at 1%. If the accuracy keeps up like this, I will have to make a switch. But ZeroBounce is very intuitive, the company seems to be doing more than the others based on reviews, data protection, and ease of use.

I really appreciate this service as it helped me to verify several e-mail in our database for my job and avoid to send our newsletters to fake contacts. I think it's a good web service, one of the most reliable I've tried on the web. For sure I recommend it.

Review.Titre: Easy process - Overall satisfied with the service
Review.Contenu: Easy process - pricing is pretty good - some of the explanations are a little ambiguous  ("catch all") - but overall we are happy with the service - thanks for the reply - but your blog does not tell me how to use Zero Bounce A.I. Scoring ??

Review.Titre: Ease of use and helpful guides
Review.Contenu: Ease of use and helpful guides to walk you through the various validation methods and results. Would be 5 stars if not for a couple issues with "unknown" results. Would give 4.5 stars if possible, since that may not be a common issue.

Review.Titre: Even though the valid list should have…
Review.Contenu: Even though the valid list should have 99.99% deliver rates we experience around 99% which in my opinion should be higher. And some catchall emails were actually validated by other services. If catchall is a server configuration this should not be possible

Review.Titre: Great tool that has helped us
Review.Contenu: Great tool that has helped us effectively clean our email list. Noticible decrease in bounce rates since we started using this tool. Would rate 5 but, only thing that can be better is the UI severely needs a refresher!! Other than that highly recommend

The service is good and quite cheap. I give only four stars because on Mailchimp some of the valid emails hard bounced. I think things could improve and maybe next time I won't get any bounces on mailchimp for emails that get into the valid category.

Review.Titre: I have not used the service
Review.Contenu: I have not used the service, but was offered a free voucher to a popular online retailer in exchange for writing a review. Sorry for harming the accuracy of the average star rating.Will be interesting to see whether I still get the voucher now.

Service was easy to use and fast. However when I sent to my list through my ESP, there were many hard bounces. Surprising since the service is called "ZeroBounce".  They followed up after my initial review and offered to re scan my list.

Good experience! The one thing that would be a huge improvement is to include a file that describes all the categories such as "catch all," "donotmail," "spamtrap," etc. I had to search for that on the website.

Review.Titre: This is the first time I used…
Review.Contenu: This is the first time I used ZeroBounce and I'm pretty satisfied with my decision. There were many companies offering similar services and I choose ZeroBounce and I'm glad I did so. It's results are quick quite accurate.

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce worked well for the price…
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce worked well for the price paid. Most affordable service for email scrubbing I've experienced. Still experienced some bounces, but it was an old list -- would have expected those would have gotten scrubbed out now.

Review.Titre: I wish it had a salesforce integration
Review.Contenu: I wish it had a salesforce integration. When dealing with thousands of contacts it just does not end up being a seamless process. Also if there was a salesforce integration, I could have all my sales reps on ZeroBounce

Review.Titre: Solid tool to help you clean those lists...
Review.Contenu: Solid tool to help you clean up and verify your email lists.  I used it in combination with other tools, as each service seemed to have a different focus, but this tool has comprehensive coverage lacking in most suites.

They provide good service. Although all the spams are not filtered most of them are. As for email validation I work as an email marketer and having valid emails are a must. ZeroBounce really helps with that. Thanks.

Overall a very good service. We had a very high bounce rate prior to using this service and this service helped us to get this in control. Giving it 4* because even after using this still 1.5% of the emails bounced.

Review.Titre: Very helpful tool for any email marketing strategy
Review.Contenu: We are still getting low bounce rates (1-2%) even by only using valid emails, but all in all this has been SUPER helpful.  We have a great server reputation now based on a 98-99% delivery rate on most email sends.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, helps us clean our emails
Review.Contenu: The various statuses (valid, catch-all, spam arrest) that zero bounce provides is really helpful. It's also easy to use where you simply upload a CSV and can download cleaned file once the file is processed.
A valuable and easy-to-use service!.  We were shocked at how "dirty" our database was after we ran it through ZeroBounce.  I feel much more confident in our data after using this service.

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce has been a good tool for us…
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce has been a good tool for us to clean our leads. We are still getting bounce rates in the 2-8% range depending on the day... so I cannot give you a 5 stars, as much as I would love too :)

Review.Titre: It is easy to use with no friction
Review.Contenu: It is easy to use with no friction. But the "unknown" (not to be decided) result is big in size (there are too many email IDs left out). It is good that the results are saved for some time.
I think that better speeds while processing files would be better for all of us. It would be better to include a Global list management and a Better “catch-all” management. Yours sincerely Albert
Overall the experience was good. However, there are a few critiques:1.) The buying process seemed unnecessarily small.2.) Paying by usage would be preferred, as opposed to purchasing quantities.

Review.Titre: I will absolutely use them again
Review.Contenu: The results of the email cleaning were amazing and this was verified by our real-world bounce rates during our sends. They easily got our neglected and out of date list of 250k whipped into shape.

Review.Titre: Ease to upload, review and understand
Review.Contenu: Zero bounce is very easy to use and a great addition to our Program.  The upload and review process was very easy, and the provided detailed result was exactly what we were looking for.
Hard to really know if the information provided in the form of the scrubbed list was thorough and accurate, but the process was pretty straightforward and the customer service was responsive.

Review.Titre: Good option to identify unused e-mail addresses
Review.Contenu: ZB really helped us with identifying fraud and unused e-mail addresses. The only missing point is; we couldn't get the name or the last name of the e-mail users most of the time.
Little over priced, APIs are awesome, easy to develop by a beginner as well with little guidance.All together it's a great solution to be tried out to minimise email bouncerates.
Great results!, it filtered out 25% of bad addresses on our 23.000 list.You could definitely improve the user experience, your website looks very old and it could be easier to use.
Fair to do the validation however couldn't verify the catch all emails to accuracy so if we send to them they mostly bounce making it tough choice considering the high price.

Review.Titre: Great service for cleaning out bad…
Review.Contenu: Great service for cleaning out bad records. Only con is the 30 min greylist period.  You will still get this even if you only put in a small amount (<100) of email records.
It's an amazing and the most affordable email verification service out there.I don't get hard bounces anymore, only soft bounces when someone's email box is full..

Review.Titre: We were having issues with a list not …
Review.Contenu: We were having issues with a list not being delivered on Mailchimp. We used ZeroBounce to filter and find the bad emails so we could remove them. Our list now worked perfectly!

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce cleansed a test list we sent…
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce cleansed a test list we sent it quite well. I really like how it flags potential spam traps; that was a great help in making usre we do not end up blacklisted.

Review.Titre: Not perfect, but good for my needs
Review.Contenu: The service was fast and decently accurate. I still had a 10% bounce rate, but that was much better than 50% based on the list I had to clean. Would use the service again!

Review.Titre: Often get not delivered status for the Valid ones
Review.Contenu: Al tough ZeroBounce provide us very good results for our processes, still for the Valid ones, we often get not delivered and restricted status through our campaigns

Review.Titre: I wanted to understand our email…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to understand our email campaigns response rate more completely. I used zerobounce to find which email addresses were faulty vs. which were blocked.
I like the service. It could use some improvement regarding accuracy and several other minor things. I'm not happy prices are going up, but it is a good tool.
The automation and personalized options means less manual work for me. I know that customers are getting the messages I want them to, when I want them to.
I feel like ZeroBonce is a great service overall. It's easy to use and quick. My feedback is I wish you could buy a small number of credits at a time.
Zerobounce is an amazing tool for recruiters to find out if an email account it's actually active or don't. It's very helpful for email dutty

Review.Titre: Easy to use and provides clear results.
Skip some steps while nurturing your email leads with ZeroBounce!
Review.Contenu: I have tried to refine my 10K newsletter audience and it did work fine. It helped me nurture my leads further without sending any unnecessary emailings.

Review.Titre: I ran 9500 names of customers that…
Review.Contenu: I ran 9500 names of customers that haven't been into my shop in 4 years or more and it found 4500 good email address. I really like this product.
Reasonable price, turnaround, and results. It did take some time to clean the lists, but the output was generally clean with limited hard bounces
Design looks very simple, a little old. Does the job but not as accurate when seeing the mailchimp results. No same app has been perfect either.

Review.Titre: The uploading process is a bit confuse.
Review.Contenu: The uploading process is a bit confuse.I am not sure is using txt or csv format for the cleaning files.The unclear separator descriptions.
Generally speaking, it's a great service. I hope you guys will work on your website and make it more user friendly to navigate through.

Review.Titre: I need job because my per me
RECENTLY WE HAVE STARTED THE EMAIL…
Review.Contenu: RECENTLY WE HAVE STARTED THE EMAIL VAILDATION PROCESS, ZERO BOUNCE ACCOUNT IS HELPFUL TO VAILDATE THE EMAILS, USEFUL FOR OUR BUSINESS
This is a good product. but we had getting some issue in implemention for our produciton application. they solved immediately... Thanks
I tried out ZeroBounce and I am surprise on how well it works. It's great for weeding out invalid email addresses and spam traps.
Simple and easy to setup.Didn't know these add-ons until recently. Works as it should and doesn't take any of your time.

Review.Titre: We had a very great experience with…
Review.Contenu: We had a very great experience with ZeroBounce!  It was fast, efficient and easy to use we will continue to recommend to others.

Review.Titre: The process was very fast to check 50K …
Review.Contenu: The process was very fast to check 50K emails.  I like the different spreadsheets that were created for each type of issue.
I have minimized my bounce mails. The platform is intuitive and easy to use. I 'll recommend others to try the service.
Easy to use and reliable - has really helped out with our outreach strategy! Real time updates would be a 5 star rating :D

Review.Titre: Very good with only a few emails that…

It works as advertised. Haven’t had long enough experience with it find any friction points but so far so good.

Review.Titre: Some of the correct emails reported as …
Review.Contenu: Some of the correct emails reported as invalid, we could not understand the reason.Generally fine and nice.

Fast and easy. But however if your database is too large you can’t download it. So break it down if you can.

Review.Titre: I used it to get rid of fake email …
Review.Contenu: I used it to get rid of fake email addresses when people sign in to my website. Did the job as expected.
The email verification code is a pain for moving through many lists, but the verification works great!
I like the interface simplicity, but its design is outdated.The validation process took a long time.
Nice platform. Multiple steps required to access the verified lists but otherwise very easy to use.
Doing great job. But for some Yahoo ids getting as valid but is invalid. Please take care of that.

Review.Titre: Zero Bounce has been very useful in…
Review.Contenu: Zero Bounce has been very useful in dealing with my website email lists. It’s been smooth ride.
Zerobounce processed over 3000 emails in a very short time.   I’m happy with the clean results.
Service was great.  Really helped me solve a problem.  They deliver what they say they can do.
Helped us with "cleaning" our mailing list. Using it on a daily basis as well.
Update: everything worked out.  Just be mindful of yahoo addresses when cleaning a list you are going to use on Amazon SES.  Because it could cause issue.

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce is a game-changer for anyone…
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce is a game-changer for anyone serious about email marketing. In a world where email deliverability and list quality are paramount, ZeroBounce stands out as a reliable and efficient solution.
Wonderful expereince. Did exactly what it was supposed to do

Review.Titre: The best service I ever used
Review.Contenu: The best service I ever used, to be honest. The interface is user-friendly, and from the beginning, it was easy to understand how to proceed compared with other companies.

Wow! ZeroBounce has completely transformed the way I approach email marketing. As a small business owner, I was struggling with poor deliverability rates and low engagement from my email campaigns. But since I started using ZeroBounce, everything changed for the better.The user-friendly interface made me feel at ease right from the start. I'm not a tech-savvy person, but uploading my email lists and accessing the validation services was a breeze. The platform's simplicity allowed me to get things done quickly, saving me valuable time for other business tasks.

Review.Titre: I have tested many services like…
Review.Contenu: I have tested many services like ZeroBounce but there's no comparison. The quality, helpfulness and availability is unmatched. Every email on my list matters. These guys have proven to be the best

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce has made my life easier
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce has made my life so much easier! When it's time to send my marketing campaigns, I run it first by ZeroBounce to ensure they arrive directly in my customers' inbox. Intuitive and easy to use, I have been using ZeroBounce for more than a year now and I would highly recommend them!

One of the most user-friendly Email Validation tools on the market. I came to ZeroBounce to validate my email lists and found many other useful tools that I can use for my organisation, like the email finder.I also found out that it can be integrated with a lot of third parties, like my wordpress website, zapier and mailchimp. The support team was really friendly and helpful in aiding me configure these integrations.I strongly recommend this to any organisation!

ZeroBounce is an amazing service that always goes above and beyond my expectations. Not only do they offer a great service but anytime I have questions or need specific help with a feature, there’s always someone willing to help me. I always recommend ZeroBounce to anyone looking to validate emails for their business.

Zerobounce drive to support me as a customer and follow back on my issues. The most I have gotten out of a service lately and the best overall experience with support. Also their UI is continuously upgrading my workflow.

Review.Titre: I am using ZB for few months now with…
Review.Contenu: I am using ZB for few months now with my shopify store and it's working perfectly. My open rate improved alot and their prices are very decent for a small business like mine.
With ZeroBounce my emailing campaign have better results. Easy to use tool, user-friendly interface and the best part is the customer support. Instantly available to help.
The most accurate email validation service, at least for me, and I tested most of the players on this market. Also, it works great with all my integrations, and they have top support! Thank you!

I've been using ZeroBounce.net for a while now and I have to say, it's been an incredibly rewarding experience. The quality of the email verification services they provide is top-notch and has greatly enhanced the efficiency of my email marketing campaigns.Their interface is user-friendly, making it easy to upload and validate lists. I was particularly impressed with the speed and accuracy of the service, as well as the detailed reporting provided. It's evident they take data accuracy and security seriously, which gives me confidence in their services.Moreover, ZeroBounce's customer service is exceptional. Any query or issue I've had has been promptly addressed by their knowledgeable and friendly team.Overall, ZeroBounce.net has exceeded my expectations on all fronts. I can't recommend their services enough for anyone needing reliable email verification and list cleaning. Definitely deserving of a 5-star rating!

Review.Titre: I’m using ZeroBounce with my mailchimp…
Review.Contenu: I’m using ZeroBounce with my mailchimp account for all my newsletters and it works perfectly. Their support is great, the platform is easy to use and I just feel my data secure with them.
Just wont to follow up here. The guys are simple incredible, their support and escalation process is so good. They helped me with my broker files which I am very grateful!

Review.Titre: One of the best on the market
Review.Contenu: One of the best email validation tools on the market, as it truly delivers. But what most impressed me was their support. They really care and do their best to help you.
Awesome app.....beside improving my campaigns, I love playing with the Email Finder feature which I found innovative and interactive. Already recommended ZeroBounce to all my friends. :)

We use ZeroBounce via its API, to validate emails during signups on our website.  It was exceptionally easy to implement ZeroBounce, and from day one without interruption, it has worked reliably for us.  Their pricing is transparent and fair, and we've had no problems at all with their charges -- I wish I could say that about some other SaaS providers.

Review.Titre: What we needed for the time we needed it
Review.Contenu: We have several people using their own distribution lists that have been un-moderated. Using ZeroBounce we were able to quickly identify the list that was causing our domain to be blocked at certain times.With the pay as you go approach we were able to see the value without having to make a long term commitment.

ZeroBounce is great! Our campaigns are occasional and somewhat irregular (i.e., not weekly or monthly, but rather event-based or as needed), so we signed up for the "freemium" account. I appreciate the monthly freebies (100 free email validation credits upon sign-up, then another 100 free credits each month). These credits never expire, which again works really well for our business. Using ZeroBounce is intuitive and frustration-free. I would recommend it to anyone. Sure, there are cheaper options out there, but ZeroBounce is accredited and trustworthy.

Review.Titre: They fixed a major problem.  Great customer service.
Review.Contenu: In my former review of ZeroBounce I gave them a lot of grief for what I considered a bit of pricing bait-and-switch.  After the review went up they spent a great deal of effort to make things right with me and with the general public.  First, they refunded my fee.  Next, they gave me credits for future usage.  Finally, they updated their website to address my concerns.  With rapid and effective customer service like this I can't in good faith keep my former negative review posted.  And considering the fact that I was prepared to give them 5 stars in the first place, I'll go ahead and give it to them now.  Their responsiveness to my concerns was impressive.

Review.Titre: Zerobounce has been a life saver for…
Review.Contenu: Zerobounce has been a life saver for many of our projects. It's easy to use and the way the results are given still allows us to ultimately decide whether to send to an email or not. It would be great if you would add a service to verify phone numbers (landline vs mobile) and detect errors in the numbers (such as a transposed area code).

Review.Titre: ZeroBounce is an absolute dream come…
Review.Contenu: ZeroBounce is an absolute dream come true! It's as close to perfection as I could imagine. It's as if someone(s) got inside my head and know what I wanted and needed- even without my ability to define my needs/ desires. One excellent benefit is the way that they follow-up with alerts- love it! I absolutely, without reservations recommend ZeroBounce.

Review.Titre: Really a nice tool to validate emails
Review.Contenu: Really a nice tool to validate emails. The support is excellent and the process to reach out for help is very simplified.

Review.Titre: From trial to large scale use - a success story
Review.Contenu: We started using ZeroBounce on a trial basis (minimum plan) last year July and moved to large volumes - currently we use a few hundred thousand calls this year. There are glitches though (like gmailnator email ids not shown as disposable and repeated requests to tech team fell on deaf years).  Except for these aspects, overall a great experience, very helpful support team (bad experience with tech team who aren't responsive to customer requests). Heartily recommend it to others.

Review.Titre: Zero Bounce is an easy to use email…
Review.Contenu: Zero Bounce is an easy to use email validator and scoring system. It has worked great for me whether  upload multiple contacts or just one.Love this tool and use it to validate every email address. I would definitely recommend this for anyone trying to build an email list.

Review.Titre: Using them for over a year now and…
Review.Contenu: Using them for over a year now and their accuracy is amazing. They are adding new features monthly nowadays which is great!

Review.Titre: Why I insist that Customers let me use ZeroBounce
Review.Contenu: I have used ZeroBounce on several occasions to screen mailing lists for clients who want me to set them up for a bulk email system. I explain to them that they will be wasting their time if the emails can't be received due to bad addresses. The processing by ZeroBounce is just about effortless, and the results are detailed enough to let my customers know where they need to focus their efforts if they truly want to reach everyone on their lists. This is about as close to a no-brainer as you can get. Fast, inexpensive and effective.

Review.Titre: The best customer services and representatives!
Review.Contenu: I dont know much about this type of industry. I signed up with ZeroBounce, but I had lots of questions in setting things up. This representative Raluca, made me feel valued customer, and I believe that the time she spent in helping me was worth triple or more the dollar amount I spent with the services. What a great company, great customer service and services! Thanks Zero Bounce!

Review.Titre: Very lucky to work with Bee
Review.Contenu: Bee is an excellent person to work with. I feel lucky to work with her as she has all the knowledge needed in her position coupled with the right attitude to help customers. I don't think I would have done business with Zerobounce if it wasn't for Bee who represented the company perfect just how the CEO wanted it to be represented.

Review.Titre: I needed to quickly validate a database…
Review.Contenu: I needed to quickly validate a database for a one off project I am completing. I am the least tech savvy girl on the internet so I was worried. Raluca at ZeroBounce made it all effortless and easy - going so far as to send me a YouTube video to teach me how to convert a file. She helped me find a completely reasonably priced plan and held my hand the whole way through. I can't recommend Raluca or ZeroBounce highly enough!

Review.Titre: They mean what they say...they deliver high quality!
Review.Contenu: These guys are thorough. Tested the service and compared it with well-known competitors. Trounced them each and every time! I loved the AI Scoring of catchall emails. Genius! I have the lowest "invalid" or "unknown" results because they check everything. The best money I have spent on email verification. There is no way you can go wrong with Zerobounce. Highly recommended!

Attentive and welcomingQuick feedback after sending an e-mail on question about zerobounce result on status for a domain. My remark has been taken in account to improve Zerobounce e-mail validation.Thank you to support team

Review.Titre: Truly a friend in need on my last…
Review.Contenu: Truly a friend in need on my last campaign. The site is easy to use and also their support is on point every time. I highly recommend their services, you'll get your bang for buck value 100%

I would like to take the time to Thank You, for your outstanding service, professionalism and courtesy. Seems like everyone is looking for a vote of confidence these days.  After a while, yes it does get frustrating, however; I have no problem taking the time to say, "well done." this time, and proud to do it.Keep up the great job you are doing.  I'm sure you guys put a lot of time into this project. I have been on the internet for a while and I do know the difference.    Thank You Again,   Sincerely  Captain Henri D. Aubin (pianoman)

Review.Titre: Crina was amazing on the chat and…
Review.Contenu: Crina was amazing on the chat and walked me through every step - I scrubbed set up the account and scrubbed 7K email lists and downloaded the results all in under an hour. It was a wonderful experience and I will absolutely use them again.

Review.Titre: I'm facing a mismatch between the…
Review.Contenu: I'm facing a mismatch between the Sandbox result when calling from API and using the single email validator on the website. The supporter gave me great support on the Thanks giving day! Thank he/she again.

I was reluctant to sign up as have never had experience of how to validate email lists, but through the chat service with Andrei, I was assisted all the way through the process with really clear and helpful explanations. All my questions were answered clearly and concisely and I would defo use Zerobounce again.Excellent service and super helpful :))

I was extremely impressed by what I would state to be unparalleled service experience with ZeroBounce. Cezar went out of his way to assist with every one of my requirements and then some. Thank you. I HIGHLY recommend dealing with ZeroBounce.

Review.Titre: I love the new email finder product
Review.Contenu: I love the new email finder product! ZeroBounce keeps releasing new products and features rapidly. They also listened to my feedback and made a tweak on the product. I love it!!

Review.Titre: If you’re looking round wondering who…
Review.Contenu: If you’re looking round wondering who to go with then just use this company. Cheapest around and the customer service/chat was brilliant. Walked me through the whole process and answers all my questions.

Review.Titre: Great service - it really works to reduce bounces…
Review.Contenu: This is the second list I have had Zero Bounce process- the service and the deliverable is outstanding With the first list, we reduced our bounces to less than 2% - Its quite a bit difference than the almost 20% bounce rate we had before Zero Bounce

Review.Titre: Unintended Consequences of Sending Bulk Email
Review.Contenu: I run a legitimate non-profit and occassionally send bulk emails through a popular email service.Little did I know that I could be flagged as a spammer by my email service provider, not just the recipients.Without knowing all that I needed to know, my email was shut down and I couldn't even send individual emails from my own account to people that I regularly email.I learned my lesson.  ZeroBounce flags all the spam traps and emails that end up getting you on the 'abuse' list.A large list of emails is enticing, but if you send to the wrong ones, you're headed for trouble.ZeroBounce culled through my list, fixed bad emails and flagged bad addresses and ones to use caution with.It's a fabulous learning tool too that can make you a smarter marketer and more focused on getting the job done.Super easy to use and absolutely critical if you send to a large list.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and very quick turnaround
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and very quick turnaround! The more detailed codes are very helpful when determining which contacts to keep and which to delete. The abuse category is especially helpful because we know to remove them.

Amazing Service , great support,the validations are 90- 99% correct and keep my server nice and healthy !the support is amazing and always are there to offer you a deal ! dont hesitate to open that chat window they rock !!!!

Review.Titre: Great online customer support -- I just signed up!
Review.Contenu: The online chat customer support was helpful and, more importantly, extremely knowledgeable. They helped me validate my test data set and answered all my silly questions. I went from a potential customer to a customer in a matter of 15 minutes. Thanks!

Review.Titre: I've used many email de-dupe products: ZeroBounce wins
Review.Contenu: I've used many email de-dupe products. I now use ZeroBounce exclusively. I found it suitable for all jobs now. Getting email correct is really important unless you want to get your account frozen by HubSpot, MailChimp and so on. I use ZeroBounce to get rid of de-dupes, incorrect or stale email addresses. It;s also great cause you get a .XLS file with the cleaned names which I then reload back to the marketing CRM.  A great product, give it a go.

Review.Titre: I get very few bounced emails.
Review.Contenu: I want to make sure that I don't get blacklisted.  I use this service to insure the deliverability of my emails. I avoid spam traps and email addresses that are undeliverable.  Thank you ZeroBounce!  And the price is reasonable.

The app surpassed my expectations, establishing itself as an essential asset in my email marketing toolkit. precise email verification and data appending features,  our campaigns have experienced a remarkable boost in performance.Oh, and they have outstanding customer support (responded asap).

Review.Titre: This is the best email validation…
Review.Contenu: This is the best email validation service. MediaShares does email marketing as one of our services so it is very important that when we upload a list to an ESP that it is very clean.

Review.Titre: I had an amazing experience with…
Review.Contenu: I had an amazing experience with Zerobounce! Customer support is incredibly helpful and knowledgeable, making the onboarding easy and fast. Highly recommend their services!

Review.Titre: Great and speedy online chat support
Review.Contenu: Great and speedy online chat support. My Q's were instantly met and answered by professionals. An hour from the time I entered the Zero Bounce page, my problem was solved. We finally managed to validate all of our contact list in less than 60 min. A problem we struggled to solve for over 2 weeks. Do try it out!
Very impressed with their highly technical responses over weekend. Good job Paulp and thanks for solving my issue!

Review.Titre: I started to use ZeroBounce to clean up…
Review.Contenu: I started to use ZeroBounce to clean up my 26,000+ contact list. It saved my MailChimp account from being MESSY! I ran into a technical error (it was my fault) and Anca and Tech Support were able to help save the day! I will continue to keep using it!! Thanks!!

Review.Titre: Not just about taking your money
Review.Contenu: I used up some of my credits verifying a file I already did in error. They were human enough to know mistakes happen and restored my credits to me. They put the human behind the business!
Really responsive to questions, and available at all hours (including weekends when we tend to crunch a lot of email data). Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: When I have had to speak with someone…
Review.Contenu: When I have had to speak with someone they have been very helpful, the pricing is excellent, and we rarely have to call because the software is so easy to use.  We have checked almost 1 million emails thus far.  We used to end up on every spam list, now we are almost completely clean.  Thank you Zerobounce Team.
ZeroBounce gives me greater confidence that my emails will reach their intended target - and that my email domain will not be flagged for spam.

Review.Titre: Used them to verify a few thousand…
Review.Contenu: Used them to verify a few thousand emails. Results were quickly and efficiently arranged for easy sorting after tests were run. Would recommend!!

Review.Titre: Accuracy is MUCH better than other…
Review.Contenu: Accuracy is MUCH better than other services that I have tried.  Also, the customer service is great.  With Bounceless it was been nonexistent. I am so glad I switch to ZeroBounce.
Excellent email checking service! If your looking for a great solution for filtering the good emails from the bad on any of your email lists give bounch a try.
Email validation an essential tool for businesses to market products and services. ZeroBounce validates emails quickly so you don't get burnt.
Everything is great! Support, sales team, user experience...

Amazing customer service! Got the help I needed and even more. The tool is very easy to use and great level of emphasis has been put on the security aspect of the contact handling. Very pleased with ZeroBounce!
Dan was prompt with my inquiry and quick to get answers. I appreciate that because when I get into a project with deadlines, it makes my work easier.
I had an issue that needed to be resolved late at night, and to my surprise the issue was taken care of within minutes. Very happy with this kind of service, zero bounce has earned my loyalty!
We had several thousand emails and your process was amazingly simple. It would have taken staff unknown hours of time. You saved us a lot of work at an excellent price!
ZeroBounce is extremely accurate and easy to use. Helps me on a daily basis to know if I am sending an email to a correct email address. This is important with my job within the sales field.
Excellent Support, both for spporting and troobleshoot. Very reactive, I had made costful mistakesn they have found the right solution, very quickly
This company has the best customer service. For someone who is not very familiar with email lists and excel, this company was understanding and provided 5 star support.
Ionut was very helpful with my issues and went above and beyond to make things right and to keep me happy. Will recommend these services to everyone.

Customer service was excellent, I did something wrong with my listts and they fixed it for me. No hassle, no issues, in 10 minutes it was done. The service itself seems great.

Awesome Service!Quick and cheap in my oppinion. So how much time would it take to validate every Mail Adress manually? I don´t have time to do it. And my loan is much higher than the prive for this service. Everything perfect.
